channel.title: Villages Ready to Explode?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Villages Ready to Explode?" - Any villages ready to go through the Impossible Mission?

item.title: Re: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: oh crap. i never even noticed the forum bar at the top in the game lol thanx

item.title: Re: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: Check the forums. That's what they're there for. On the far right side of the links in-game.

item.title: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.content:encoded: I've seent the perks of the villagers that went through the Impossible Mission and they are soooooo great. I kind of think that its an unfair advantage to the game but whatever. Anways, does anyone know of any villages that are ready to pop?
